task_name: Conduct Structured Candidate Interview and Evaluation
context: to evaluate candidates for open positions across departments using standardized interview process
description: Comprehensive candidate interview process including pre-interview preparation, structured interview execution, skills evaluation, and post-interview documentation. Uses standardized interview checklist to ensure consistency across all departments (SMM, Design, Video Editor, Developer, etc.). Includes behavioral questions, technical assessments, culture fit evaluation, and detailed feedback documentation in Notion ATS system. Critical for maintaining hiring quality and building strong teams.
estimated_duration: 2 hours (30 min prep + 60 min interview + 30 min documentation)
success_criteria: Interview completed within scheduled time (60 minutes)
All checklist questions asked and documented
Technical skills evaluated with specific examples
Detailed feedback documented in Notion within 2 hours
Hiring decision recommendation provided (yes/no/maybe with rationale)

steps.name: Pre-interview preparation
outputs: Interview questions prepared based on role requirements
Video call link tested and sent to candidate

steps.name: Technical skills evaluation
outputs: Tool proficiency evaluated (design, coding, video editing, etc.)

steps.name: Post-interview documentation and evaluation
outputs: Evaluation scorecard completed (1-5 scale for each competency)
Next steps determined (second interview, technical test, offer, reject)

checklist.item: Interview: All behavioral questions asked and documented
Interview: Technical skills evaluated with examples
Post-interview: Detailed notes entered in Notion ATS
Post-interview: Hiring recommendation provided with rationale
Post-interview: Next steps communicated to candidate within 24 hours

roi_metrics.hiring_quality: Structured process improves hire success rate by 40% vs unstructured interviews
roi_metrics.time_efficiency: Standardized checklist reduces interview time by 30 minutes while maintaining quality
roi_metrics.consistency: Ensures fair and consistent evaluation across all candidates and departments

responsibility_name: conduct interview, evaluate candidate, create interview checklist, send contract
